description:
The three stooges create a new console that won’t break giving Squid Girl and Eiko a chance to play. Ayumi shares why she can speak with Squid Girl and a special person. Squid Girl makes the mistake of hiding from the family.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wanna Squiddle with It? / Aren`t You a Squiddle Weird? / What Do You Ink of Hide-and-Seek?
壊さなイカ? / 普通じゃなイカ? / 隠れなイカ?
